Package companyappointmentmanagementsystem.controller

Class DateTimeInputController

  • java.lang.Object
    • companyappointmentmanagementsystem.controller.BaseController
      • companyappointmentmanagementsystem.controller.DateTimeInputController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class DateTimeInputController
extends BaseController
    Controller for date time input form. This form is responsible to picking date and time. The picked value is zone independent.
